class.name: Shape3D
class.brief_description: Base class for all 3D shape resources.
class.description: Base class for all 3D shape resources. Nodes that inherit from this can be used as shapes for a [PhysicsBody3D] or [Area3D] objects.

method.name: get_debug_mesh
method.description: Returns the [ArrayMesh] used to draw the debug collision for this [Shape3D].

members.member: The shape's custom solver bias. Defines how much bodies react to enforce contact separation when this shape is involved. When set to [code]0[/code], the default value from [member ProjectSettings.physics/3d/solver/default_contact_bias] is used.
